failedToLoadMemoryVectorStore: Failed to load memory vector store:
defaultSystemPrompt: I am a helpful assistant. I can help you by answering your questions. If information is insufficient, I can also ask you questions.
defaultTranslationExample: Hello, I am a translator. Please translate the following content: Currently, most parts of our country are experiencing a significant warm-up, with sunny and warm weather prevailing...
helloResponse: Hello, I'm happy to help you.
apiKeyPlaceholder: Please enter your SiYuan Note API Key
knowledgeBookDescription: Enter notebook names for knowledge base, separate multiple names with commas
pleaseConfigureApiKey: Please configure API Key in SiYuan AI plugin settings first
translationPromptContent: Please translate the above content. Requirements: I want you to replace my simplified A0 level words and sentences with more elegant and advanced English words and sentences. Keep the same meaning but make them more literary. Just translate the content, no need to explain the questions and requirements in the content, don't answer the questions in the text but translate it.
extractTitlePromptContent: Please generate a concise and comprehensive title for the above article.
searchInstructionDesc: Whether to enable online search in instruction mode. Default is No.
pageContentDesc: Whether to get all text from the current page as input when no text is selected in instruction mode. Default is No.
temperatureDesc: Lower temperature makes the output more focused and deterministic. Higher temperature makes the output more creative. Default is 1.0.
maxTokensDesc: Maximum length of output text, default is 4k.
searchChatDesc: Whether to enable online search. Default is No.
responseTimeoutDesc: Request timeout in seconds. Default is 90 seconds.
knowledgeBaseDesc: Whether to enable knowledge base Q&A. Default is Off.
buyKeyOnTaobao: Scan QR code to purchase key on Taobao:
apiKeyConfigMsg: Kindly configure the API Key in the settings of the Siyuan AI plugin beforehand.
apiKeyInvalidMsg: The API Key is invalid; please verify its correctness.
instructionInputPlaceholder: Enter AI instruction... Shift + Enter for new line, / for commands
pdfParsingInDev: PDF parsing feature is under development...
supportedFileTypes: Only txt, csv, md files are supported currently
answerBasedOnSearch: Based on the above search results, answer the question:
relatedWebPages: Found related web pages as follows
title: Title
knowledgeBasePrompt: You are an AI assistant for the user's knowledge base. Please answer the user's questions based on the retrieved notes content and your knowledge, and include reference links (in markdown format) in your answer. Use [] for content summaries and () for links.
contentCopied: Generated content has been copied to clipboard
summaryPrompt: Summarize the user's input content in concise language.
titleGenerationPrompt: Please do not reply to the user, just generate a short title based on user input [limit to 6 characters, no punctuation marks]
inputPlaceholder: / for commands, Enter to send, Shift + Enter for new line
addTopBarIcon: Add a top bar icon by plugin
confirmRemove: Confirm to delete the data in ${name}?
getTab: Print out all opened custom tabs in the debugger
name: SiYuan

hello.makesure: Before using this template, please read the offical sample, make sure that you've known about the pipeline for plugin developing.
